/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC   -mcpu=cortex-a8 -mfpu=neon -mfloat-abi=hard   -O3 -g0  -DNDEBUG  -shared -Wl,-soname,libraspicam.so.0.1 -o libraspicam.so.0.1.8 CMakeFiles/raspicam.dir/raspicam.cpp.o CMakeFiles/raspicam.dir/raspicam_still.cpp.o CMakeFiles/raspicam.dir/private/private_impl.cpp.o CMakeFiles/raspicam.dir/private/threadcondition.cpp.o CMakeFiles/raspicam.dir/private_still/private_still_impl.cpp.o -Wl,-rpath,/opt/vc/lib: -lpthread /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_core.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal_util.so /opt/vc/lib/libmmal.so
